item.description:
Summer is here!

This is a great time that your whole family can join the meeting. This time, we are going to have our meeting at Hopkinton sate park. There are trails, BBQ areas, and beach for swimming there.


It is a great time for all of us to enjoy the nature.

The parking fee ($5-10) for each car is $5-$10. You can get a free pass from your local library.

We also can carpool to save fuel. If you are able to provide a ride or you need a ride, please send me a email. Thank you.
This is a great opportunity that we can meet families and have a great discussion or just enjoy the nature.

About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: we can meet in the frist parking place on your right side after you enter
item.name: Let's enjoy the Sun and outdoor discussion
